document_title: Prostate cancer: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_name: ung-thu-tuyen-tien-liet.json_9_Nutrition for people with prostate cancer
subsection_content: Although prostate cancer cannot be cured with nutrition, a diet low in red meat (beef, pork, goat...), low in animal fat and high in green vegetables and fruits can help slow down the progression. of cancer. In addition, this nutritional regimen also contributes to reducing the development of prostate tumors as well as the risk of disease recurrence after treatment.
subsection_title: ung thu tuyen tien liet.json. Nutrition for people with prostate cancer
subsection_data:
ung thu tuyen tien liet.json. Nutrition for people with prostate cancer
Although prostate cancer cannot be cured with nutrition, a diet low in red meat (beef, pork, goat...), low in animal fat and high in green vegetables and fruits can help slow down the progression. of cancer. In addition, this nutritional regimen also contributes to reducing the development of prostate tumors as well as the risk of disease recurrence after treatment.
